title: Shattered Souls | Episode Three: "Distraction and Discombobulation"
itunes:title: Shattered Souls | Episode Three: "Distraction and Discombobulation"
description:
SPECIAL LOOK AT A BRAND NEW PODCAST! "Shattered Souls: The Car Barn Murders." As the detectives followed lead after lead, nothing seemed to be panning out. Karen Smith starts following leads of her own, including an attempted robbery of another ticket office that provided a suspect description. 

Subscribe to the Shattered Souls podcast now to hear more. Episodes 1-10 available now!

Apple Podcast

iHeart

Spotify

Music: The New Real by Sam Johnson at www.samjohnsonlive.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
